headline: 2025-11-03 — Research authors published an analysis that reviewed 5 years of state-of-the-art machine learning models for cyberattack detection, explicitly analyzing 'past 5 years' of research (5 years).
2025-11-05 — The same authors flagged 1 specific research gap: the need for further machine learning research on detection of drive-by download attacks (1 identified gap).
2025-11-04 — Transfusion medicine directors completed a national survey of 18 Canadian pediatric tertiary hospitals (surveyed 18 hospitals) with a 100% response rate (18 hospitals, 100% response).
